message: “Our jaws dropped at how unbelievable the statistics are and how cruel and inhumane the whole subject matter is,” Presnell describes. “So what we're doing is essentially training over 100 law enforcement officers from around the state…and at least one life if not many more will be saved just because of where we are today.”

data.description: Human trafficking is often described as modern day slavery.” The crime is happening across the country, even in the Augusta area. On Wednesday, local law enforcement went through a training course on how to spot the signs.
data.title: Training happening locally to spot the signs of human trafficking
